items.title: H pylori Screening Shows No Overall Benefit After MI
items.description: The study shows neutral results overall, but patients with anemia or kidney failure appeared to benefit. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Could We Catch Heart Failure Sooner?
items.description: Noninvasive tools may help primary care physicians detect heart failure before patients land in the hospital. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Radiation May Improve PFS in Recurrent High-Risk Meningioma
items.description: Combining extent of surgical resection with molecular profiling predicts risk for recurrence and may help guide adjuvant radiotherapy. Medscape Medica...

items.title: Cancer Patients Request Financial Support Exceeding $5000
items.description: Researchers analyzed requests for assistance from patients with cancer enrolled in a novel digital support registry. Medscape Medical News
